item.title: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos
item.description: Take a look at 28 amazing sports photos from May 10 through May 16.
item.ExtractedText: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Updated 1228 GMT (2028 HKT) May 17, 2016 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Texas second baseman Rougned Odor, right, punches Toronto outfielder Jose Bautista during a Major League Baseball game in Arlington, Texas, on Sunday, May 15. The confrontation, which sparked a bench-clearing brawl, came after the base-running Bautista slid hard into second to try to break up a double play. Both players were ejected, as were several others involved in the brawl afterward. Hide Caption 1 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Barcelona forward Luis Suarez celebrates the second of his three goals Saturday, May 14, in Granada, Spain. His hat trick gave Barcelona the victory it needed to clinch its second straight Spanish league title. Hide Caption 2 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Washington pitcher Max Scherzer, not pictured, tied a Major League record with 20 strikeouts in a game on Wednesday, May 11. Only two other pitchers in league history have struck out that many people in a nine-inning game: Kerry Wood and Roger Clemens. Clemens did it twice in his career. Hide Caption 3 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Serena Williams drops a piece of the trophy she received after winning the Italian Open in Rome on Sunday, May 15. Hide Caption 4 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Hakuko forces Shodai out of the ring Wednesday, May 11, during the Summer Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo. Hide Caption 5 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Cris "Cyborg" Justino punches Leslie Smith during a UFC event in Curitiba, Brazil, on Saturday, May 14. Justino, widely regarded as one of the world's top female fighters, was making her UFC debut. She won with a first-round stoppage. Hide Caption 6 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Tampa Bay forward Alex Killorn slips the puck past Pittsburgh's Matt Murray during Game 1 of the NHL's Eastern Conference Final on Friday, May 13. Tampa Bay won 3-1. Hide Caption 7 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos High jumper Priscilla Frederick competes for Antigua and Barbuda during the Diamond League event in Shanghai, China, on Saturday, May 14. Hide Caption 8 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos TV reporter Guerin Austin is an unlucky bystander as David Ortiz is doused by his Boston teammates on Saturday, May 14. Ortiz had just won a game with a base hit. Austin was good-natured about the incident on Twitter and wore a light-blue raincoat the next day. Hide Caption 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Synchronized divers from France compete at the European Championships in London on Friday, May 13. Hide Caption 10 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Toronto's DeMar DeRozan is fouled by Miami's Josh Richardson during an NBA playoff game on Sunday, May 15. DeRozen scored 28 points as the Raptors won Game 7 and advanced to the Eastern Conference Finals. Hide Caption 11 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos An engine explodes on the car of drag racer Leah Pritchett during the Southern Nationals in Commerce, Georgia, on Friday, May 13. It is a common sight in drag racing, where engines are pushed to their limits. Hide Caption 12 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Clayton Oliver of the Melbourne Demons is tackled during an Australian Football League match against the Western Bulldogs on Sunday, May 15. Hide Caption 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen competes at the Spanish Grand Prix on Sunday, May 15. Hide Caption 14 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Jason Clark, a rugby player for the South Sydney Rabbitohs, needed 26 stitches on his face after he collided with an opponent during a match on Friday, May 13. Hide Caption 15 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Argentine long jumper Julian Cherit lands in the pit during an event in Rio de Janeiro on Sunday, May 15. Hide Caption 16 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos The world's top-ranked golfer, Jason Day, celebrates with his son, Dash, after winning the Players Championship on Sunday, May 15. Hide Caption 17 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Formula One driver Max Verstappen celebrates on the podium after winning the Spanish Grand Prix on Sunday, May 15. The 18-year-old is the youngest F1 winner ever. Hide Caption 18 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Stephen Curry celebrates a basket during an NBA playoff game against Portland on Wednesday, May 11. Curry scored 29 points as Golden State advanced to the Western Conference Finals. Earlier in the day, he was named league MVP for the second year in a row. Hide Caption 19 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Chloe Kautzmann, a synchronized swimmer from France, competes at the European Championships in London on Wednesday, May 11. Hide Caption 20 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos David Allan rides Duke of Firenze to victory during a race in York, England, on Thursday, May 12. Hide Caption 21 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos NASCAR driver Reed Sorenson wrecks during the Sprint Cup race in Dover, Delaware, on Sunday, May 15. He was not injured. Hide Caption 22 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Bayern Munich manager Pep Guardiola is doused in beer as the soccer club celebrates its German league title on Saturday, May 14. It is the fourth straight title for Bayern. Hide Caption 23 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Canada's Ryan O'Reilly tries to play the puck in front of French goalie Ronan Quemener during a game at the World Championships on Monday, May 16. The tournament is taking place in St. Petersburg, Russia. Hide Caption 24 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Umpires are escorted onto the field by "Star Wars" stormtroopers before a Major League Baseball game in Phoenix on Saturday, May 14. It was "Star Wars Night" at the ballpark. Hide Caption 25 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Novak Djokovic throws his racket during the Italian Open final on Sunday, May 15. He lost to Andy Murray in straight sets. Hide Caption 26 of 28 28 photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Philadelphia's David Lough crashes into the outfield wall as he tries to make a catch during a home game on Sunday, May 15. Hide Caption
